explains: v. 给……接种疫苗；接种疫苗

sentences.en: Boser has to vaccinate her foxes against various diseases.
sentences.cn: 博瑟必须给她的狐狸接种预防各种疾病的疫苗。

sentences.en: They vaccinate our children and help us to recover when we are sick.
sentences.cn: 他们对我们的儿童进行预防接种并帮助我们在患病时康复。

sentences.en: Fortunately, in recent years most American egg producers have started to vaccinate their flocks.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，美国最大的蛋品生产商近年来已经开始对鸡群接种。
